title: Valeriagra
report: It does help sometimes with my insomnia, but the most interesting thing is that sometimes when using valerian root extract I get a huge erection, and I am certain after many tests that it is because of the valerian.  We might have in our hands the next viagra, or maybe I'm just weird.  I'm only 24 so I don't use it for erectile dysfunction, but it might be a good idea.

erowid.citation: Juan the Chemist. "Valeriagra: experience with Valerian (ID 70993)". Erowid.org. May 6, 2008. erowid.org/exp/70993
